channel.title: Drama on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Drama on Butterfly Dream

item.title: On the NUST fines/issues
item.description: I will start this by saying I attended E&ME College, NUST from 2003-2007. Hence, I have a very personal taste on these issues that everyone is talking about. To get it out of the way, EM&E College, NUST was a horrible place to study. Simply terri-bad. I have spent years of my life after my time there trying to erase it from my memory. Granted I met some of my best friends in that university, but most if not all friendships were based on our mutual hatred of EM&E and its administration.
